    Obtain Median and Credible Intervals from MCMC samples

    samples_median_ci.Rd

    Obtain Median and Credible Intervals from MCMC samples

    samples_median_ci(samples, level = 0.95)

    Arguments

    samples

    (matrix)
    with samples in rows and parameters in columns.

    level

    (number)
    credibility level to use for the credible intervals.

    Value

    A data.frame with columns median, lower and upper.

    Examples

    set.seed(123)
samples <- cbind(rnorm(100, 0, 1), rexp(100, 0.5), rpois(100, 5))
samples_median_ci(samples)
#>       median       lower     upper
#> 1 0.06175631 -1.62117157  1.925078
#> 2 1.43032130  0.05393852  7.073300
#> 3 5.00000000  2.00000000 10.000000
